Package org.blockchainnative.metadata

Class ParameterInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.metadata.ParameterInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthereumParameterInfo, FabricParameterInfo
    public class ParameterInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds additional information about a parameter of a smart contract method.

    It is recommended to use ContractInfoBuilder and its subtypes to construct instances of this class.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    ContractInfoBuilder, ContractInfo, ContractWrapperGenerator

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParameterInfo

        public ParameterInfo​(java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter,
                     int parameterIndex)
        Constructs a new ParameterInfo
        Parameters:
        parameter - parameter on the method on the smart contract interface.
        parameterIndex - index of the parameter as it occurs in the method declaration

      • ParameterInfo

        public ParameterInfo​(java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter,
                     int parameterIndex,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterClass,
                     java.lang.Class<?> passParameterAsType,
                     java.lang.String specialArgumentName)
        Constructs a new ParameterInfo
        Parameters:
        parameter - parameter on the method on the smart contract interface.
        parameterIndex - index of the parameter as it occurs in the method declaration
        typeConverterClass - type converter used to convert the parameter before passing it to the underlying provider
        passParameterAsType - type the parameter should be converted to before passing it to the underlying provider
        specialArgumentName - special argument name for this parameter
